title: Mcp-Server-Qdrant
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for interacting with the Qdrant vector search engine, providing semantic memory storage and retrieval functionality.
creator: qdrant

QDRANT_URL.description: URL of the Qdrant server, e.g., `http://localhost:6333`

QDRANT_API_KEY.description: API key for the Qdrant server (optional, but recommended for security).

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collection for storing and retrieving vector data.

FASTEMBED_MODEL_NAME.description: The name of the FastEmbed model used for encoding memories. Defaults to `sentence-transformers/all-MiniLM-L6-v2`.
